name: Eroboi: Legend of the Game Camp
name_original: Eroboi: Legend of the Game Camp
description:
Made for the 2017 UTDallas Women in Games game in conjunction with Funimation for the release of NEW GAME!'s season 2 translation. 

This game was completed in two days by Jax Schmisseur (https://princedazai.itch.io)  and Talia Henry. 

We hope you enjoy it!
